item.title: Org-mode example
item.description: Python R Here you can find the features available when using org-mode to write blog article. Python We use the package gregsexton/ob-ipython emacs package. %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as npdef foo(x): return x + 9 [foo(x) + 7 for x in range(7)] [16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22] plt.hist(np.random.randn(20000), bins=200) R hist(x = rnorm(100))
